title: Who is the richest female country music star? - Quora

response.answer_text: Several contemporary sources agree that this honor goes to Dolly Parton, whose estimated net worth of $500 million makes her the wealthiest personality of any gender in country music; Shania Twain, Toby Keith, and Garth Brooks also rank high on the lists, with wealth in excess of $300 million each. Parton, now 73 years old, was born in a one-room cabin in the Great Smoky Mountains of Tennessee. Her father was an illiterate laborer and her mother, from whom she learned her first lessons in storytelling and songwriting, had given birth to twelve children by age 35. The doctor who delivered Dolly was paid with a bag of cornmeal. She learned to play on a makeshift homemade guitar. Her first performances were in church. She was well known to local radio listeners by age 10, appeared on The Grand Ole Opry at 13, and secured a recording deal in Nashville almost immediately after graduating high school. In addition to her status as a legendary songwriter and chart-topping singer, Parton is also a successful actress and a diversified businesswoman. Her Dollywood Company has invested heavily in tourism in Parton’s native east Tennessee, and Parton was a producer of Buffy the Vampire Slayer and the 1995 remake of Sabrina, among other films and shows. As noted in the comments below, Dolly Parton is admired for her positive and confident representation of women’s issues, her commitment to philanthropy, her friendship to fellow musicians, and for her humility and generosity. “We can’t direct the wind,” she says, “but we can adjust the sails.”

Jon Pardi Net Worth: $8 Million. ... Chris Stapleton Net Worth: $12 Million. ... Eric Church Net Worth: $14 Million. ... Lee Ann Womack Net Worth: $20 Million. ... Zac Brown Net Worth: $25 Million. ... Trisha Yearwood Net Worth: $40 Million. ... Lady Antebellum Net Worth: $41 Million. ... Miranda Lambert Net Worth: $45 Million.
